choices: Changes in infrastructure made outside Terraform
A planned change in Terraform configuration
explain: Drift occurs when the real infrastructure changes without Terraform being informed, causing differences between state and reality.

q: Which command detects resource drift without making changes to infrastructure?
explain: `terraform plan -refresh-only` refreshes state from the real infrastructure and shows differences without applying changes.

q: How can you update the state to match the real infrastructure without changing the configuration?
explain: `terraform refresh` updates state to match reality without altering configuration.

q: Which command lets you add an existing resource into Terraform state?
explain: `terraform import` associates a real-world resource with Terraform state so it can be managed.

q: Which command removes a resource from state without destroying it?
explain: `terraform state rm` removes a resource from Terraform state without affecting the actual infrastructure.
